title: Autumn Wind and Rain
description:
Zhang Luofeng is just trying to live a peaceful life - all he wants is fit in at school and make friends! He’s even got a crush on Yin Qiuqiu, the beautiful but cold Disciplinary Committee Head. The problem? He’s the young master of the mountain bandits of Sui Feng Fortress! 

A tale about the ups and downs of high school life, Autumn Wind and Rain is about fighting back against bullies, the thorny path of adolescent love, and, finally, the importance of letting go. Real men stand against the current and fight for their dreams!

To read this in Tachiyomi, download the Cubari extension and search Cubari:gist/JOGXj
Gemelli Scans Discord: https://discord.gg/KQjamQY
author: Er Qi
